channel.title: Compiler error!
channel.description:
Hello peeps, i really need help with the java compiler!
[size=36pt]There's a new error! ;'( SCROLL DOWN TO SEE IT PLEASE!! [/size]
here's my email: Heavenboy.96@hotmail.com i really need some help! thanks!.

item.title: Compiler error!
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

[quote=“Ameer1996, post:1, topic:417189”]Hello peeps, i really need help with the java compiler!

[size=36pt]There’s a new error! ;’( SCROLL DOWN TO SEE IT PLEASE!!
[/size]

here’s my email:
Heavenboy.96@hotmail.com
i really need some help! thanks!.[/quote]

Download this JDK 6 Update 27 with NetBeans 7.0.1 http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk-netbeans-jsp-142931.html

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error!
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

If this isnt working, search if you installed jdk…

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler error!
item.dc:creator: @Ameer1996 Ameer1996
item.description:
@Ameer1996 wrote:

Here’s my compiler:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_29\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

And my error :

javac: file not found: *.java usage: javac use -help for alist of possible options press any key to continue...

And yeah i have tried this solution:
Computer> proprieties>Advanced setting>variables setting>new>C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_29\bin;

but sadly it didn’t work :’(

Read full topic

The 0.0.0.0 might of been put there just for display.

item.title: Compiler error!

item.description:
@Ameer1996 wrote:

That means it’s compiled. Just ignore that.
